description: Aspose.Tasks is a class library for working with Microsoft Project files. Using Aspose.Tasks for .NET you can work with MPP, MPT, XML, XLSX, HTML, PDF, XAML and other formats in your applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

    Features

   TASKS-33656 Implement Resource.GUID field reading/writing for mpp 2007 file format and add public field Resource.GUID.
   TASKS-33674 Use source file GanttchartView information to render the project data like GanttBarStyle start shape, end shape and middle color
   TASKS-33667 Option to show/hide GanttChart View while converting MPP->PDF
   TASKS-33666 Provide graphical Indicators Column while conversion MPP->PDF

    Bug fixes

    TASKS-33692 NullPointer exception while conversion from MPP to PDF
    TASKS-33675 Title missing in Timeline view
    TASKS-33670 Output files differ while project is created with and without template MPP file
    TASKS-33669 Tasks indentation lost in HTML created by Aspose.Tasks
    TASKS-33662 All the lines in MPP are dual-shade with 3D effect while lines are solid in MPP->PDF by Aspose.Tasks
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
